replies.body: Will there be merch for sale?
Yep, League merch will be at sale at MSG during Semis.
Will skin codes be given out
I think there is a typo in the TLDR section. Madison Square Garden doors open at 4:00 PM local time (Eastern Time) and games begin at 5:00 PM ET.

When should I show up?

Doors open at 4:00 PM local time (ET) on October 21 - October 22.

When does the event start?

The event begins at 6:00 PM local time (ET) on October 21-22 and games will immediately follow the pre-show analysis.
I was confused about this as well. Game begins at 6:00 PM right?
You're right. Games begin at 6:00 PM and doors open 2 hours before at 4:00 PM. It's been fixed in the TLDR.
Is Riftwalk accessible for _any_ Semifinals ticket holder both days? Or is it only accessible on the day for which you have a ticket?
An additional question, related to the above: Is there a place where people who don't have semi's tickets can purchase tickets to see the Riftwalk?
Another question: How long does it normally take to go through Riftwalk?
There isn't a place to be able to purchase tickets for just the RiftWalk, and the Riftwalk typically takes about 10-20 minutes to get through the experience.

That is subject to demand, and if they allow ticket holders from other days in, it will be at the decision of the onsite staff. (fire codes can be fun :P )  I would come to the Riftwalk the day you have your ticket, just to be safe, as it only takes about 10-20 minutes to go through the whole experience.
Alright cool, that's very helpful, thank you!!

Is there a coat check? Can I check my bags or luggage?
There is not a coat or baggage check at Madison Square Garden so so please make other arrangements for your larger, oversized bags.
The typo, "so so" xd
{{item:3632}}
Thank you so so much for helping us get this fixed :)
For the ticket pickups, do you guys accept eTickets, or must I pick up the tickets at the box office? Is there any other alternatives to getting my tickets without heading to the box office?
MSG will scan mobile QR (square) barcodes from the Ticketmaster app, however, if it's a TicketFast ticket (PDF) then, it must be printed on paper.

I went to the NA Summer Finals at MSG last year and if you have the (what I presume is the same) TicketMaster app you can just go through security and up to where your supposed to be seated and they'll scan the tickets off your phone.
Will there be a way for fans to meet the players and get pictures or get things signed?
Sadly, due to venue size, we aren't doing pro meet and greets at MSG. We want to make sure the pros have time to focus on the games and preform at their best.
Venue size didn't seem to matter last year. I was at MSG for NA finals and you definitely did a meet and greet because I have  a picture with team liquid.
That is true. There was a signing before, and meet and greets after. Bummer that they had nothing this year.

Overall, I think this experience was much worse than 2015 NA Finals at MSG. There was less stuff to do preshow. No team was doing a signing, like TIP did before, and the signs they gave out to write on, they were censoring what you could write, which seems unfair (e.g. They wouldn't let you write boosted on it while other people already wrote it on the sign). Also, it was a bummer that the players didn't do meet and greets after. Please work a little harder on the preshow activities next time. :/
I live in NYC but i have school :(
I will hang out with you

The staff you have working the Riftwalk is amazing.  They are friendly and clearly enjoy what they are doing.  I saw them constantly engaging people and making the whole thing fun.  

Bravo.
Will Riot employees be giving out any skin  codes?
Can't wait, finally going and I am cheering for Rox, they deserve to win.
lol i want go there. T_T im from indonesia. so far far away. T_T
Looking for someone/group to hang around in the Riftwalk and in the Pre-show, anyone available?
Can i bring my Keyboard? would love to get it signed .
